com.rexsl.core

Class RestfulServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.rexsl.core.RestfulServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Servlet, ServletConfig

    @Loggable(value=1)
public final class RestfulServlet
extends HttpServlet
    The only and the main servlet from ReXSL framework.

    You don't need to instantiate this class directly. It is instantiated by servlet container according to configuration from web.xml. Should be used in web.xml (together with XsltFilter) like that: 

     <servlet>
  <servlet-name>RestfulServlet</servlet-name>
  <servlet-class>com.rexsl.core.RestfulServlet</servlet-class>
  <init-param>
   <param-name>com.rexsl.PACKAGES</param-name>
   <param-value>com.rexsl.foo</param-value>
  </init-param>
 </servlet>
 <servlet-mapping>
  <servlet-name>RestfulServlet</servlet-name>
  <url-pattern>/*</url-pattern>
 </servlet-mapping>

    com.rexsl.PACKAGES init parameter should contain comma-separated list of packages where JAX-RS annotated resources are located and should be discovered. If this parameter is not set a runtime exception will be thrown and the servlet won't be initialized. The same will happen if the parameter contains incorrect data. We will consider a package is valid if and only if it abides to the Java package naming conventions.

    Since:
    0.2
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)
    See Also:
    Introduction to ReXSL, Java Servlet Technology, jls-6.1, Java naming conventions, Naming a package, Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • PACKAGES

        public static final String PACKAGES
        Name of servlet init param.

        This parameter should be used in servlet initialization section of web.xml in order to tell the servlet in which packages your JAX-RS annotated resources are located. The value of the parameter should contain a comma-separated list of Java package names.

        Since:
        0.3.7
        See Also:
        RestfulServlet, Constant Field Values
